EntityCodexEntryDef.label: witch's factor
EntityCodexEntryDef.description: An anomaly foreign to this rimworld. It infects humanoids on a psychic level, eventually reducing them to murderous monsters.

EntityCodexEntryDef.label: narehate corpse
EntityCodexEntryDef.description: This corpse was once a humanoid cursed by the witch's factor, eventually becoming a narehate of a witch.\n\nWhile narehates of witches possess a form of immortality, there are still specific methods capable of killing them.

EntityCodexEntryDef.label: narehate of a witch
EntityCodexEntryDef.description: Upon becoming a narehate, all previous magic vanishes, leaving behind an empty shell.\n\nHowever, they possess the immortal body of a witch and physical abilities that defy reason. They usually move slowly.

EntityCodexEntryDef.label: Yuki, the Great Witch
EntityCodexEntryDef.description: The culprit behind everything, the Great Witch patiently awaiting the arrival of destruction.\n\nShe has lost almost all her magic in order to spread the curse of the witch's factor.
